member.name: M:FlightPlanApi.Controllers.FlightPlanController.FileFlightPlan(FlightPlanApi.Models.FlightPlan)
member.summary: Files a new flight plan with the system
member.remarks:
Sample request:
POST /api/v1/flightplan/file { "aircraft_identification": "N67SVS", "aircraft_type": "PA-34 Piper Seneca", "airspeed": 128, "altitude": 12000, "flight_type": "VFR", "fuel_hours": 3, "fuel_minutes": 41, "departure_time": "2022-07-08T00:26:45Z", "estimated_arrival_time": "2022-07-08T03:49:45Z", "departing_airport": "KBXA", "arrival_airport": "KNZY", "route": "KBXA JOH J46 DMDUP J46 KNZY", "remarks": "", "number_onboard": 4 }
member.param: The fight plan data to be filed.
member.response: There is a problem with the flight plan data received by this system
The flight plan is valid but this system cannot process it
